cast.name: 克里格波·马萨亚瓦尼奇 Krirkphol Masayavanich
澄江·露吉娜侬 Chutcha Rujinanon
索拉朋·切特里 Sorapong Chatree

director.name: 塔康基·维拉万 Takonkiet Viravan

this_title: ดวงไฟในพายุ
introduction: Natee grew up in a tough household. his mother especially expected a lot from him. He was always picked on at university. The only person that was nice to him was Fah, a student in the faculty of social works. He developed feelings for her. She too liked him a lot, but there was another guy that liked her. Natee was under a lot of pressure and one night someone offered him some drugs and he tried it. He was hooked from then on.
foreign_title: ดวงไฟในพายุ
